item.title: About
item.author: Author
item.description: Trying to keep a blog, I hope Hi everyone, how are you doing? I hope everyone will be ok, my name is Rafael, and here I’m like an attempt to make and (which I consider more difficult) to maintain a personal blog. In 2022 I will complete 10 years as a software developer, so my idea is to use this space to share some stuff that I had an opportunity to learn in this period, studying a lot and working with incredible people.
